Why apply for Octopus Automatic Add Value Service (AAVS)?
Enjoy cash rebate
You can earn up to 2% cash rebate every time you top up your credit card with designated credit cards such as EarnMORE UnionPay Card, Simply Cash Visa Card, etc. cash rebate. It is worth noting that AAVS only reloads once a day and there is a cap on cashback earnings.
Enjoy air miles
Link up Octopus AAVS with designated credit cards such as Citi Prestige Card and DBS Black World Mastercard to earn air miles for free air tickets, accommodation and rental services.
Enjoy welcome offers
Although cardholders cannot top-up O! ePay directly, new customers can still make use of an octopus card and a mobile phone supporting NFC function to top up in order to earn welcome offers. After card issuance, cardholders are required to first sign up for AAVS first before reloading Octopus daily for transferring funds to O! ePay account until meeting the minimum spending requirement for credit card welcome offers. Although it requires much effort, cardholders can get welcome offers with no extra cost.
Points to note for AAVS with credit cards
Reload limit: AAVS only reloads once and the amount is between HK$150/HK$250/HK$500, depending on cardholders’ preference.
Loss of Octopus Card: In case you lose your Octopus card with AAVS, you should immediately call the Lost Octopus Reporting Hotline on 2266 2266 to minimise your loss because you are still liable to the expenses of the card for the first three hours.
Apply for AAVS for more than one credit card: You can apply AAVS for up to 6 octopus cards, including three octopus cards for yourself or 3 for your friends and family.
How to apply for Octopus Automatic Add Value Service?
To be eligible, you must be at least 18 years of age and possess a valid credit card from a participating bank:
Step 1
Choose your bank
The applicant can select one credit card from the list of recommended credit cards from the above. Things you may want to consider include the type of rewards (cash back or miles) and the reload amount.
Step 2
Submit your application
Fill in your personal particulars on the application form and submit it to your chosen bank, which will then process your application.
Step 3
Activate your AAVS
It takes two to three weeks to process your application. Once approved, an activation letter will be mailed to you. You can then activate your AAVS function in the Octopus App or with an Octopus PC Reader via the Internet.
Octopus Automatic Add Value Service (AAVS) Offers
Offer 1: Receive HK$50 spending rebate for linking up AAVS with HSBC credit card
Linking up Octopus Automatic Add Value Service (AAVS) with HSBC credit card to receive a HK$50 spending rebate on top of the basic RewardCash with every reload. Promotion ends on 30 June 2020.
Offer 2: Upgrade Auto-reload Amount to HK$500 to enjoy HK$50 Top-up Value
From now until 30 June 2020, enjoy HK$50 Octopus top-up value when you upgrade your auto-reload amount from HK$150 or HK$250 to HK$500. To be eligible, the cardholder needs to register for the upgrade promotion, and complete at least one auto-reload transaction on or before 31 July 2020.
FAQ
Is Octopus Automatic Add Value Service (AAVS) available for all credit cards?
No. You can only link up AAVS with designated credit cards such as the above selected credit cards recommended by MoneySmart such as EarnMORE UnionPay Card, Standard Chartered Simply Cash Visa Card, Citi Cash Back Card, Citi Octopus Platinum Card, Standard Chartered Asia Miles Mastercard, Citi Prestige Card and DBS Black World Mastercard, etc.
Is there a fee for applying for AAVS?
There is no fee for applying for AAVS. Instead, some banks provide applicants with welcome offers for applying for AAVS. For example, HSBC offers HK$50 spending rebates for customers who link up AAVS with HSBC credit cards before 30 June 2020.
How to activate AAVS upon successful application?
For Android users, the simplest way is to download Octopus App and activate the service on the applications. Non-Android users need to buy a compatible Near Field Communication (NFC)-enabled mobile device to activate AAVS.
How can I change my AAVS from one bank to another?
To switch to a new bank, you just have to fill in and submit an application form to the newly designated bank. Please note that you will be required to pay a HK$20 handling fee.
How can I cancel the AAVS?
You can call Octopus Customer Service Hotline on 2266 2222 to cancel the AAVS. An authorisation letter for deactivating the AAVS function on your Octopus will be mailed to you accordingly. You are required to present this letter and your Octopus card to any MTR Customer Service Centre within 10 calendar days to cancel the AAVS.
How to contact Octopus Card centre?
For enquiry, you can contact the Octopus Customer Service Hotline on 2266 2222 during office hours (Mon-Fri 9 am-9 pm or Sat 9-6 pm).
